Data Products

The following is an overview of the data products created by the pipeline.

Data Products

File Extension

Unit

Note

intb

DN/px

overscan subtracted and trimmed bias

int

e-/px

reduced output intensity

intd

e-/px

dark current/scattered light removed

intf

e-/px

instrumental variations removed

intk

e-/px

sky subtracted

obj

e-/px

un-sky subtracted object panel (Nod & Shuffle)

sky

e-/px

sky model image or sky panel (Nod & Shuffle)

opt_cube

e-/px

data cube from OptimalExtract

chi_cube

e-/px

data cube from ChisquareExtract

final_cube_opt

flux/px

Wavelength corrected data cube (OptimalExtract)

final_cube_chi

flux/px

Wavelength corrected data cube (ChisquareExtract)

Different master files generated during the analysis are listed below.

Master files created

File Extension

Full Name

Note

marcs

Master Arc

mbias

Master Bias

mcbars

Master Continuum Bars

mdarks

Master Dark

mdome

Master Dome Flat

mflat

Master Internal Flat

mobj

Master Object
